newsitem.title: USA: New York bunker prices soften, Houston up.
newsitem.headline: New York bunker prices soften, Houston up.

text.p: North American bunker prices were steady late this week in extremely quiet trade due to a holiday in many European centers, players said Thursday.
In New York Harbor on the East Coast, spot 380 CST was assessed at $96 a tonne and $98 a tonne, with 180 CST also steady at $102/103.
Houston was assessed unchanged at par with New York.
"It's really a quiet day. The markets aren't moving anywhere because of the holiday in Europe," said a Harbor trader.
In Seattle in the northwest, spot 380 CST was up a $1 at $101/102 but trade was also very light.
